did.abstract: The records consist of a report titled, "Residential Lending in New Haven County."

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Jerome N. Frank Legal Services Organization

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 26-E (YRG 26-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale Law School.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jerome N. Frank Legal Services Organization, Yale Law School, Records (RU 202). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of a report titled, "Residential Lending in New Haven County."
